message_1: Suppose the message "HELLO WORLD" is encrypted using the Rail Fence Cipher with a key of 3. Write down the cipher text and decrypt it using the same key.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence Cipher with a key of 3, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters in each row from left to right to get the cipher text:

Cipher text: HOR ELWLD LO

To decrypt the cipher text using the same key, we arrange the letters back into the zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters in the zigzag pattern to get the original message:

Decrypted message: HELLO WORLD
